homepage: http://www.fivestarproduction.co.th/วอนทั้งโลกโขกหัวเธอ/
original_title: วอนทั้งโลกโขกหัวเธอ
overview: Charn is working on his thesis to convert the Concert Hall project to Music Complex, and his advisor suggests him to see Gerrard for any information regarding the project. Every time Charn went to see Gerrard, he keeps missing him. But he has a chance to meet Piengdao, who is working for Gerrard.
title: Warn Tung Loke Khok Hua Thur
